carpet.rule.renewableGravel.desc: Cobbled Deepslate crushed by falling anvils maks Gravel.
carpet.rule.disabledNetherPortals.desc: Removes the ability to enter a Nether Portal.
carpet.rule.disabledEndPortals.desc: Removes the ability to enter an End Portal.
carpet.rule.moreMobsOnLeads.desc: Allow Leads to be attached to more mobs.
carpet.rule.pvpToggle.desc: Allows players to Opt into PvP on a world.
carpet.rule.ladderAnywhere.desc: Allows the ladders to be placed anywhere.
pixel_carpet.pvp_toggle.on: PvP for you is now on.
pixel_carpet.pvp_toggle.off: PvP for you is now off.
pixel_carpet.pvp_toggle.disabled: PvP Toggling is disabled by default in Carpet.
